thread.title: Cris Prouty
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Cris Prouty

author: Cris Prouty
title: Cris Prouty
text: great great company handled the whole process professionally job well done can not thank you enough it only has five stars i would give you 100 stars if i could. great team at Optima i would like to thank everyone individually you are awesome and great i will recommend you all to everyone i know 100 star rating awesome Brand Silva thank you very very much for your help and also to your team you all are great and awesome
